name: Battlewasp - Azusa the Ghost Bow
desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
When your opponent takes damage by another "Battlewasp" monster's effect, even during the Damage Step: You can inflict damage to your opponent equal to that monster's original ATK. You can only use this effect of "Battlewasp - Azusa the Ghost Bow" once per turn. When a monster is destroyed by a battle involving your "Battlewasp" monster while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card in Defense Position, but banish it when it leaves the field.
